*** Settings ***
Documentation   foo documentation
Test Setup      setup
Test Teardown   teardown

*** Test Cases ***
testcase
    bar  hello

*** Keywords ***
bar
    [Arguments]  ${bar}
    dumdum  ${bar}
    try regions after this fuzz '${bar}' buzz
    a kw  fuzz '${bar}' buzz
    given a kw
    foo lib underscore
    ${variable}=  a kw
    kw with an argument kw  a kw  some arg
    comment  foo baaraouau
    #other kind of comment	

a_kw
    comment  foo
			
fuzz '${infix}' buzz
     dimsum  ${infix} 

#comment here also
